name: Birthday Parties
short_detail: For weddings with basic plan and limited item
details: Event Planner is currently offering full service wedding planning packages. Our team will be your advocate throughout the entire wedding planning process to create a unique experience for your guests, ensuring that your celebration is unforgettable. With expertise in investment management, event design and styling, and planning and execution, our goal is to save you time and resources  as we design, build, and execute every element of your wedding. As your planner, we invite you to be as hands-on as you would like as you trust us to bring your wedding vision to life. We strive for it to be the best possible experience it can be, for both you and your family and friends. Together, we can plan an experience of a lifetime.
